attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public requests the PM to call an early general election. He was neither voted for by the electorate, nor has done anything to prevent the scandalous "expenses circus" from ridiculing British democracy.
The general public deserves to be given the chance to hold these MP's accountable for their actions and treat them accordingly.
Saying sorry for deliberately falesly claiming monies not owed to them is simply noy enough!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
